column1: Kata Robata////It is not a big restaurant
column3: but once you are seated you are immediately immersed in the hustle and bustle of service
column4: and they are quick to greet you.  The servers are not overly friendly
column5: but will guide you on the menu if you are not familiar with some of the items.  They have specials that change frequently
column6: so be sure to check that out
column7: but below are some suggestions to try!
